msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Plumbed soft keyboard hint properties from SkinnableTextBase to StageText.
Fixed some excessive padding around StageText.
Added a style to control when prompt text disappears from text controls.
Changed prompt to be a non-StageText to fix z-order issues.
Added a workaround for the lack of a StageText "enter" event (only works on Android).
QE notes: The fix for SDK-30728 is only a partial workaround. It still does not work on iOS.
Bugs: SDK-30781 - iOS: SoftKeyboard hints don't appear when StageText is used on iPodTouch, and iPad2
SDK-30740 - StageText: Prompt displays over content.
SDK-30737 - SoftKeyboard does not appears on the first tap on TextInput
SDK-30736 - Text prompt disappears when text got focus
SDK-30728 - "Enter" key does not work correctly in StageText
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Initial checkin of StageText-based skins for mobile TextInput and TextArea. New default skins have not been changed yet. Skins use native text controls on Android and iOS devices.
QE notes: Padding isn't correct yet. Skins do not yet work on iOS because of runtime bug 2906305.
Reviewer: Carol Frampton, Jason Szeto, Alex Harui
Tests run: Checkin tests, focusManager tests
